featured.text: He then _____ himself as a security guard and walked out the front gate.
A player of Mills had possession of the ball, and Deborah ran to guard against her.
The two security guards will be from all their duties until further investigation is completed.
When the male dies, the group needs a new “security guard.”

definition.en_def: A person or device that protects or watches over something.
definition.example: The guard stood at the entrance to ensure everyone's safety.
